actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to construct a new community-based outpatient clinic at Ord Military Community, California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to construct a new community-based outpatient clinic at the Ord Military Community, California. Makes such construction subject to: (1) the completion of a feasibility study; and (2) the availability of appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to construct a new community-based outpatient clinic at Ord Military Community, California.
